thread.title: Orlando shooter's widow seeks jail release pending trial
thread.title_full: Orlando shooter's widow seeks jail release pending trial

author: AP News
title: Orlando shooter's widow seeks jail release pending trial
text:
Orlando shooter's widow seeks jail release pending trial AP News Share Tweet 
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) â€” Lawyers for the widow of the man who staged a deadly terrorist attack at a Florida nightclub had no advance knowledge of the plot and did not know ahead of time that her husband planned to buy ammunition while they were on a trip to Walmart. 
Noor Salman's attorneys said Tuesday in court filings arguing for her release from jail that she had no involvement or knowledge of her husband Omar Mateen's plan to attack the Pulse Nightclub in Orlando on June 12. Mateen shot to death 49 people and wounded 53 others before police killed him. 
Salman was arrested in November and will appear in an Oakland, California, federal court Wednesday seeking her release from jail.
